Message:
Everyone turned their heads
in shock at my sudden shout.
I don’t usually like to yell...
But, right now, I have to!

“The world is bigger
than you think!
It goes way beyond
where the map cuts off!

So I just know there’s gotta be
a place out there somewhere
with no X’s!”

I actually wasn’t too sure
if my words were true or not...

Those places could be destroyed
by demons as we head for them,
or may not even exist
anymore at all...

But, those things wouldn’t
change even if we stayed here.
So...!

“I’m gonna find
a place with no X’s!”

“I’ll find a whole new
frontier just for us...!”

Then, I stretched out my hand
to the closed door of the shelter...!
